mapper.sql: mid, parent_id, name, url, type, order_num, create_time, modify_time
mapper.insert:
insert into meun_manager
mid,
parent_id,
name,
url,
type,
order_num,
create_time,
modify_time,
remark,
#{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update meun_manager
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update meun_manager set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update meun_manager set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT meun_manager.mid, meun_manager.parent_id, meun_manager.`name`, meun_manager.type, meun_manager.order_num FROM meun_manager WHERE meun_manager.type = #{type} AND meun_manager.parent_id = #{parentId} AND meun_manager.mid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT role_menu.menu_id FROM role_menu INNER JOIN user_role ON ( user_role.role_id = role_menu.role_id ) INNER JOIN business_user ON ( business_user.bid = user_role.user_id ) WHERE business_user.bid = #{bid} ) ORDER BY meun_manager.mid, meun_manager.order_num

select m.mid,m.parent_id,m.name,m.type,m.order_num from meun_manager m where m.type=#{type} and m.parent_id=#{parentId} and m.mid in ( select DISTINCT rm.menu_id from role_menu rm left join role r on (r.role_id=rm.role_id) left join user_role ur on (ur.role_id=r.role_id) LEFT JOIN business_user u on (u.bid=ur.user_id) where u.user_name=(select create_person from business_user where bid=#{bid}) ) order by m.mid,m.order_num
select mid from meun_manager where remark='function:config'
